Analyze Inverse-Wishart Prior Parameters

analyze_inv_wishart_prior.Rd

Calculates the expectation and variance of diagonal elements for an Inverse-Wishart distribution W^-1(V, nu). Uses defaults from rhierMnlRwMixture if nu or V are NULL.

Usage

analyze_inv_wishart_prior(nvar, nu = NULL, V = NULL)

Arguments

nvar

Number of variables (dimension of the matrix).

nu

Degrees of freedom (scalar > nvar - 1). Optional.

V

A positive definite scale matrix (nvar x nvar). Optional.

Value

A list containing the expectation matrix 'E_X' and a vector 'Var_X_diag' with variances of the diagonal elements. Returns NA for values if conditions on 'nu' are not met.

References

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Inverse-Wishart_distribution
